body: "La Gringa" blogs about a strike led by teachers and taxi drivers in La Ceiba on February 21. "This was the third national strike of the school year, which only began on Monday, February 14," she writes.
original_body: "La Gringa" blogs about a strike led by teachers and taxi drivers in La Ceiba on February 21. "This was the third national strike of the school year, which only began on Monday, February 14," she writes.
title: Honduras: Taxi Drivers and Teachers Strike
